```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Base Scenario

```{r}
metric_supply = read_csv("/Users/alexanderkell/Documents/SGI/Projects/11-starter-kits/data/processed/scenarios/Kenya/base/Results/MCAMetric_Supply.csv")
metric_supply = filter(metric_supply, commodity=="electricity")
metric_supply_summed = metric_supply %>% group_by(technology, year,  sector) %>% summarise(generated=sum(supply))
head(metric_supply_summed)
```

```{r}
osemosys_generation = read_csv("/Users/alexanderkell/Documents/SGI/Projects/11-starter-kits/data/processed/osemosys-outputs/kenya-capacity-output.csv")
head(osemosys_generation)
```

```{r}
base_muse = metric_supply_summed %>% select(technology, year, generated)
base_muse$Model = "MUSE"
base_osemosys = osemosys_generation %>% select(technology, year, generated)
base_osemosys$Model = "OSeMOSYS"

base = rbind(base_muse, base_osemosys)
base
```

```{r}
base %>% ggplot(aes(x=year, y=generated, fill=technology)) + geom_area(colour="black") + facet_wrap(~Model) + theme_classic() + ggtitle("Base scenario")

ggsave("/Users/alexanderkell/Documents/SGI/Projects/11-starter-kits/reports/figures/comparison/base.pdf", dpi=1000)
```
